description:
It`s summer break, and that means it`s time for Yushi to begin his new training!  Now he has to stand under cold water and recite sutras, a difficult task.  The training begins to wear at him as he loses more and more weight...
As summer comes to an end, Hase comes to visit. But Akine says that Yushi`s training isn`t hard enough, and asks the landlord to make... a waterfall?!
 It`s summer break, and that means it`s time for Yushi to begin his new training!  Now he has to stand under cold water and recite sutras, a difficult task.  The training begins to wear at him as he loses more and more weight...
Source: crunchyroll
